question: What are the titles and ISBNs of books authored by John Doe that were published in the English language after 2010?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)<-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]-(author:Author)
WHERE author.Name="John Doe" AND book.Language="English" AND book.PublicationYear>2010
RETURN book, authored, author, book.Title, book.ISBN

question: List the names and email addresses of members who started their membership before 2015 and have a Premium membership type.
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)
WHERE member.MembershipStart < date("2015-01-01") AND member.MembershipType = "Premium"
RETURN member, member.Name, member.Email

question: Display the names and positions of employees working at the Central Branch who were hired after January 1st, 2020.
cypher:
MATCH (employee:Employee)-[employed_at:EMPLOYED_AT]->(branch:Branch {Name:"Central Branch"})
WHERE employee.HireDate > date("2020-01-01")
RETURN employee, employed_at, branch, employee.Name, employee.Position

question: Can you provide the publication year and subject of all books that are available in Spanish and have more than 5 copies available?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)
WHERE book.Language="Spanish" AND book.CopiesAvailable>5
RETURN book, book.PublicationYear, book.Subject

question: What are the names and phone numbers of members who have an Active membership status and borrowed a book during the last month?
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)-[has_loan:HAS_LOAN]->(loan:Loan)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]-(book:Book)
WHERE member.MembershipType = 'Active' AND loan.IssueDate >= date() - duration({days: 30})
RETURN member, has_loan, loan, checked_out, book, member.Name, member.Phone

question: Retrieve all authors names and their nationalities who have authored books with more than 200 pages and published by XYZ Publishers.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]-(publisher:Publisher {Name:"XYZ Publishers"})
WHERE book.CopiesTotal > 200
RETURN author, authored, book, published_by, publisher, author.Name, author.Nationality

question: What is the checkout timestamp for the loan pertaining to the book titled The Great Gatsby?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WHERE book.Title="The Great Gatsby"
RETURN book, checked_out, loan, checked_out.CheckoutTimestamp

question: Since which date was Susan Lee the manager of the Downtown Branch?
cypher:
MATCH (manager:Employee {Name:"Susan Lee"})<-[managing:MANAGED_BY]-(branch:Branch {Name:"Downtown Branch"})
RETURN manager, managing, branch, managing.ManagerSince

question: List the dates when the book with ISBN 978-3-16-148410-0 was available at the North Branch.
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book {ISBN:"978-3-16-148410-0"})-[relation2:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch {Name:"North Branch"})
RETURN relation2, book, branch

question: When did the book Origin of Species get checked out last and by which member?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book {Title: "Origin of Species"})-[checkout:CHECKED_OUT]-(loan:Loan)-[borrowed_by:BORROWED_BY]->(member:Member)
RETURN book, checkout, loan, borrowed_by, member, checkout.CheckoutTimestamp, member.Name
ORDER BY checkout.CheckoutTimestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Find the earliest timestamp of a loan for a book that John Smith has borrowed.
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member {Name: "John Smith"})-[relation3:HAS_LOAN]->(loan:Loan)-[relation4:CHECKED_OUT]-(book:Book)
RETURN relation4, relation3, member, loan, book, min(loan.IssueDate) as IssueDate

question: What is the typical quantity of copies in stock for titles released by Penguin Books?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[publishedBy:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher)
WHERE publisher.Name="Penguin Books"
RETURN AVG(book.CopiesAvailable)

question: Calculate the total number of loans created in the year 2022 across all library branches.
cypher:
MATCH (loan:Loan)
WHERE loan.IssueDate.year = 2022
RETURN COUNT(loan) AS TotalLoansIn2022

question: How many employees are currently employed at branches located in Seattle?
cypher:
MATCH (employee:Employee)-[relation2:EMPLOYED_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE branch.Location = "Seattle"
RETURN COUNT(employee)

question: Determine the greatest quantity of any single book written by Agatha Christie.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)
WHERE author.Name="Agatha Christie"
RETURN MAX(book.CopiesTotal)

question: What is the total number of book copies that have been borrowed over 50 times?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WITH book, COUNT(loan) AS timesLoaned
WHERE timesLoaned > 50
RETURN SUM(book.CopiesTotal)

question: Determine the average number of days books are loaned out for from the Main Street Branch.
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[relation3:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch {Name: "Main Street Branch"}),
      (book)-[relation4:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WHERE loan.ReturnDate IS NOT NULL
RETURN AVG(duration.inDays(loan.IssueDate, loan.ReturnDate).days) AS AverageLoanDays

question: Find every author who is French and has authored books that are stocked in over 10 copies at any branch in Paris.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)
MATCH (book)-[availableAt:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Nationality = "French" AND branch.Location = "Paris" AND book.CopiesAvailable > 10
RETURN author, authored, book, availableAt, branch, author.Name, author.Nationality, book.Title, branch.Location

question: Provide the titles and years of publication for books written by Agatha Christie that are in stock at branches whose names begin with Central and possess over 5 copies.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[author_of:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Name="Agatha Christie" AND branch.Name STARTS WITH "Central" AND book.CopiesAvailable > 5
RETURN author, author_of, book, available_at, branch, book.Title, book.PublicationYear

question: Can you list the Email and Phone numbers of members who have borrowed books published before 1950 and are currently checked out from branches named Downtown?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher)
MATCH (loan:Loan)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]-(book)
MATCH (loan)-[borrowed_by:BORROWED_BY]->(member:Member)
MATCH (book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE book.PublicationYear < 1950 AND branch.Name = "Downtown"
RETURN book, published_by, publisher, loan, checked_out, borrowed_by, member, available_at, branch, member.Email, member.Phone

question: List the titles of books and their corresponding publishers, where Stephen King is the author and the publishers are based in Maine.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[author_of:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher)
WHERE author.Name="Stephen King" AND publisher.Location="Maine"
RETURN author, author_of, book, published_by, publisher, book.Title, publisher.Name

question: What is the contact information (Email and Phone) for members who have borrowed books on Philosophy subject from a branch located in New York?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
MATCH (book)<-[author_of:AUTHOR_OF]-(author:Author)
MATCH (book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
MATCH (loan)-[borrowed_by:BORROWED_BY]->(member:Member)
WHERE book.Subject="Philosophy" AND branch.Location="New York"
RETURN book, author, author_of, available_at, branch, checked_out, loan, borrowed_by, member, member.Email, member.Phone

question: Find the names and DOB of authors who have written books in Spanish that are published by companies located in Spain and available in more than 20 copies at any branch.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[author_of:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher)
MATCH (book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE book.Language="Spanish" AND publisher.Location="Spain" AND book.CopiesAvailable > 20
RETURN author, author_of, book, published_by, publisher, available_at, branch, author.Name, author.DOB

question: Retrieve the issue and due dates for loans of books written by Charles Dickens and are checked out by members who joined the library in 2021.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
MATCH (loan)-[borrowed_by:BORROWED_BY]->(member:Member)
WHERE author.Name="Charles Dickens" AND member.MembershipStart.year = 2021
RETURN author, authored, book, checked_out, loan, borrowed_by, member, loan.IssueDate, loan.DueDate

question: List the ReturnTimestamps for all books authored by H.G. Wells that were returned at branches in cities starting with San.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[returnedAt:RETURNED_AT]->(loan:Loan)
MATCH (loan)-[relation7:BORROWED_BY]->(member:Member)
MATCH (book)-[relation8:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Name="H.G. Wells" AND branch.Location STARTS WITH "San"
RETURN relation8, relation7, author, authored, book, returnedAt, loan, member, branch, returnedAt.ReturnTimestamp

question: Could you supply the dates since when managers have been in position at branches possessing over 15 copies of books written by Mark Twain?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
MATCH (branch)-[managed_by:MANAGED_BY]->(manager:Employee)
WHERE author.Name="Mark Twain" AND book.CopiesAvailable > 15
RETURN author, authored, book, available_at, branch, managed_by, manager, managed_by.ManagerSince

question: Identify the email addresses of members who have borrowed books authored by Ernest Hemingway and those books were checked out exactly on January 1, 2022.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[author_of:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
MATCH (loan)-[borrowed_by:BORROWED_BY]->(member:Member)
WHERE author.Name="Ernest Hemingway" AND checked_out.CheckoutTimestamp = datetime('2022-01-01T00:00:00')
RETURN author, author_of, book, checked_out, loan, borrowed_by, member, member.Email

question: Display the CheckoutTimestamp and ReturnTimestamp for all loans relating to books authored by Jane Austen in a branch named Westside.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)-[return_at:RETURNED_AT]-(book)
MATCH (book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Name = 'Jane Austen' AND branch.Name = 'Westside'
RETURN author, authored, book, checked_out, loan, return_at, available_at, branch, checked_out.CheckoutTimestamp, return_at.ReturnTimestamp

question: How many different books authored by Tolkien and available at Downtown Library have been checked out more than 5 times?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[relation4:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[relation5:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Name="Tolkien" AND branch.Name="Downtown Library"
WITH book
MATCH (book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WITH book, COUNT(loan) AS timesCheckedOut
WHERE timesCheckedOut > 5
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT book)

question: Determine the average number of copies available for books written by authors born in the 1940s across all branches named City Library.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.DOB.year >= 1940 AND author.DOB.year < 1950 AND branch.Name = "City Library"
RETURN AVG(book.CopiesAvailable)

question: What is the total number of books on Computer Science subject authored by any author from USA and available at any branch in California?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Nationality="USA" AND book.Subject="Computer Science" AND branch.Location CONTAINS "California"
RETURN SUM(book.CopiesTotal)

question: Calculate the maximum number of times a single book, authored by Leo Tolstoy, has been loaned out across all library branches.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[relation3:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[relation4:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WHERE author.Name="Leo Tolstoy"
RETURN book.Title, COUNT(loan) AS LoanCount
ORDER BY LoanCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question: What is the minimum number of available copies of books by authors named Emily Dickinson in branches located in Massachusetts?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[relation3:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[relation4:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Name="Emily Dickinson" AND branch.Location CONTAINS "Massachusetts"
RETURN MIN(book.CopiesAvailable)

question: Count the total number of employees working in branches where books authored by George Orwell that are printed in English are available.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[relation4:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[relation5:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)<-[relation6:EMPLOYED_AT]-(employee:Employee)
WHERE author.Name='George Orwell' AND book.Language='English'
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT employee)

question: What is the email address and the position of the employee with EmployeeID E-12345?
cypher:
MATCH (employee:Employee)
WHERE employee.EmployeeID = 'E-12345'
RETURN employee, employee.Email, employee.Position

question: Give the Title and Language of the book associated with the ISBN 987-1234567890.
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)
WHERE book.ISBN = '987-1234567890'
RETURN book, book.Title, book.Language

question: Show the Name and MembershipType for the member with MemberID M-98765.
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)
WHERE member.MemberID = 'M-98765'
RETURN member, member.Name, member.MembershipType

question: Retrieve the Name and DOB of the author identified by AuthorID A-55555.
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)
WHERE author.AuthorID = 'A-55555'
RETURN author, author.Name, author.DOB

question: Display the Location and Name of the Branch where BranchID is B-2222.
cypher:
MATCH (branch:Branch)
WHERE branch.BranchID = 'B-2222'
RETURN branch, branch.Location, branch.Name

question: List the Publisher Name and Location for the publisher with PublisherID P-3333.
cypher:
MATCH (publisher:Publisher)
WHERE publisher.PublisherID = 'P-3333'
RETURN publisher, publisher.Name, publisher.Location

question: How many books are published in the Fiction subject?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)
WHERE book.Subject="Fiction"
RETURN COUNT(book)

question: How many copies of each book are there on average in the library?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)
RETURN AVG(book.CopiesAvailable) AS AverageCopiesAvailable

question: Calculate the total number of members who initiated their membership in the year 2020.
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)
WHERE member.MembershipStart.year = 2020
RETURN COUNT(member)

question: What is the maximum number of copies total for any single book in the database?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)
RETURN MAX(book.CopiesTotal)

question: Calculate the total number of employees working across all library branches.
cypher:
MATCH (employee:Employee)-[relation2:EMPLOYED_AT]->(branch:Branch)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT employee)

question: How many authors have a Nationality of Canadian?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)
WHERE author.Nationality = "Canadian"
RETURN COUNT(author)

question: What is the name of the publisher and the publication year for books written by an author born after 1970 and available at the Central Branch?
cypher:
MATCH (publisher:Publisher)<-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]-(book:Book)<-[authored_by:AUTHOR_OF]-(author:Author)
MATCH (book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.DOB > date("1970-01-01") AND branch.Name = "Central Branch"
RETURN publisher, published_by, book, authored_by, author, branch, available_at, publisher.Name, book.PublicationYear

question: Can you find the titles of books written in German by authors with German nationality that are available in more than 5 copies at any branch?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored_by:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Nationality="German" AND book.Language="German" AND book.CopiesAvailable > 5
RETURN author, authored_by, book, available_at, branch, book.Title

question: Which member names have borrowed books published by Penguin Books during the year 2021?
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)-[borrowed_by:BORROWED_BY]-(loan:Loan)
MATCH (book:Book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher)
WHERE publisher.Name="Penguin Books" AND loan.IssueDate.year=2021
RETURN member, borrowed_by, loan, published_by, book, publisher, member.Name

question: Who are the authors that have penned books about the Computer Science topic, and at which branches are these books available?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE book.Subject="Computer Science"
RETURN author, authored, book, available, branch, author.Name, branch.Name

question: List all books, along with their authors, that are available at the Downtown Branch and have been published after the year 2000.
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[authored_by:AUTHOR_OF]-(author:Author)
MATCH (book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher)
MATCH (book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE branch.Name = "Downtown Branch" AND book.PublicationYear > 2000
RETURN book, authored_by, author, published_by, publisher, available_at, branch, book.Title, author.Name

question: Identify the books along with their corresponding authors and publication years that are managed by the branch manager John Doe.
cypher:
MATCH (branchManager:Employee)-[managed_by_relation:MANAGED_BY]-(branch:Branch)<-[relation5:AVAILABLE_AT]-(book:Book)-[authored_by_relation:AUTHOR_OF]-(author:Author)
WHERE branchManager.Name="John Doe"
RETURN relation5, branchManager, managed_by_relation, branch, book, authored_by_relation, author, book.Title, author.Name, book.PublicationYear

question: For all books authored by Alice Thompson, what are the return dates and due dates for each loan recorded in 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WHERE author.Name = "Alice Thompson" AND loan.IssueDate >= datetime("2022-01-01T00:00:00") AND loan.IssueDate < datetime("2023-01-01T00:00:00")
RETURN author, authored, book, checked_out, loan, loan.ReturnDate, loan.DueDate

question: What are the return dates for all books borrowed by members who have a Premium Membership Type?
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)-[has_loan:HAS_LOAN]->(loan:Loan)
MATCH (book:Book)-[returned_at:RETURNED_AT]->(loan)
WHERE member.MembershipType="Premium"
RETURN member, has_loan, loan, returned_at, book, returned_at.ReturnTimestamp

question: Can you retrieve the checkout and return timestamps for books in the Fiction section that were published by HarperCollins?
cypher:
MATCH (publisher:Publisher)<-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]-(book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)-[returned_at:RETURNED_AT]-(book)
WHERE publisher.Name="HarperCollins" AND book.Subject="Fiction"
RETURN publisher, published_by, book, checked_out, loan, returned_at, checked_out.CheckoutTimestamp, returned_at.ReturnTimestamp

question: Which staff members work at locations that stock books written by Stephen King, and what roles do they hold?
cypher:
MATCH (employee:Employee)-[employed_at:EMPLOYED_AT]->(branch:Branch)<-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]-(book:Book)<-[authored_by:AUTHOR_OF]-(author:Author)
WHERE author.Name="Stephen King"
RETURN employee, employed_at, branch, available_at, book, authored_by, author, employee.Name, employee.Position

question: Provide the timestamps of checkouts for loans involving the book with the ISBN 978-3-16-148410-0.
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WHERE book.ISBN="978-3-16-148410-0"
RETURN book, checked_out, loan, checked_out.CheckoutTimestamp

question: For all the books checked out at branches located in New York, what are the corresponding issue dates?
cypher:
MATCH (branch:Branch)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]-(book:Book)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]->(loan:Loan)
WHERE branch.Location="New York"
RETURN branch, available_at, book, checked_out, loan, loan.IssueDate

question: What is the average publication year of books available at the Main Library that were published by Random House?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[published_by:PUBLISHED_BY]->(publisher:Publisher),
      (book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE publisher.Name="Random House" AND branch.Name="Main Library"
RETURN AVG(book.PublicationYear)

question: Can you compute the total number of available copies for books written by authors who are Canadian across all branches?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[author_of:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Nationality = "Canadian"
RETURN SUM(book.CopiesAvailable)

question: How many staff members oversee branches that have Philosophy books available?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[relation3:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)-[relation4:MANAGED_BY]-(employee:Employee)
WHERE book.Subject="Philosophy"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT employee)

question: What is the minimum number of available copies of books authored by Mark Twain across all branches?
cypher:
MATCH (author:Author)-[authored:AUTHOR_OF]->(book:Book)-[availableAt:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE author.Name="Mark Twain"
RETURN MIN(book.CopiesAvailable)

question: How many loans have been made to members who joined after 2015 and have borrowed books with a publication year before 1980?
cypher:
MATCH (member:Member)-[has_loan:HAS_LOAN]->(loan:Loan)-[checked_out:CHECKED_OUT]-(book:Book)
WHERE member.MembershipStart.year > 2015 AND book.PublicationYear < 1980
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT loan)

question: How many Science subject books are there in total across all branches located in the Downtown area?
cypher:
MATCH (book:Book)-[available_at:AVAILABLE_AT]->(branch:Branch)
WHERE book.Subject="Science" AND branch.Location CONTAINS "Downtown"
RETURN SUM(book.CopiesAvailable)
